item.title: Revisiting your own code
item.description: Almost two weeks ago I received a call for a good friend of mine, and also owner of an Hardware Store, those kind of familiar SMEs that are commited to survive through the years thanks for the every effort and their commitment to the service more over than the product.

item.title: Minimizing the blog concept
item.description: This is one of the main principles of this blog: to avoid bloated meta-information just to support content.

item.title: How to deobfuscate CSS
item.description: I found a very quite simple process to deobfuscate CSS files This is simple, if the CSS is not linked to any page, just link it in the HTML and open the .
